hints.content:
The first set of blocks shows $\purpleD2$ hundreds, $\purpleD3$ tens, and $\purpleD6$ ones so, our first addend is $\purpleD{236}$.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/2963e8bf519568f11fa061d1302a12f4306e8bfc)

The second set of blocks shows $\maroonD3$ hundreds, $\maroonD4$ tens, and $\maroonD2$ ones so, our second addend is $\maroonD{342}$.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/8534f9a78950419e1841441ff96f2a8dc49f6c01)

Together, there are $\blueE5$ hundreds, $\blueE7$ tens, and $\blueE8$ ones.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/257fbb3afd53993aa0a46e46d9f14ef6787553d1)

$500 + 70 + 8 =\blueE{578}$

This equation represents the place value blocks:

$\purpleE{236} + \maroonD{342} = \blueE{578}$

question.content:
**Which equation can be represented by the place value blocks below?**

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/b4812b7cd88e1e632a6dc02fe1d6a05170b4615d)

[[☃ radio 1]]
